argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pm2mpmhm.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | pm2mpmhm.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 3 |  | pm2mpmhm.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 4 |  | pm2mpmhm.q | |- Q = ( Poly1 ` A ) |
| 5 |  | pm2mpmhm.t | |- T = ( N pMatToMatPoly R ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_pmatring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> C e. Ring ) |
| 7 | 3 | #P_matring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 8 | 4 | #P_ply1ring | |- ( A e. Ring -> Q e. Ring ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> Q e. Ring ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( C e. Ring /\ Q e. Ring ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` C ) = ( Base ` C ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` Q ) = ( .s ` Q ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` Q ) ) = ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` Q ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( var1 ` A ) = ( var1 ` A ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` Q ) = ( Base ` Q ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 11, 12, 13, 14, 3, 4, 15, 5 | #P_pm2mpghm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T e. ( C GrpHom Q ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_pm2mpmhm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T e. ( ( mulGrp ` C ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` Q ) ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( T e. ( C GrpHom Q ) /\ T e. ( ( mulGrp ` C ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` Q ) ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` C ) = ( mulGrp ` C ) |
| 20 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` Q ) = ( mulGrp ` Q ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_isrhm | |- ( T e. ( C RingHom Q ) <-> ( ( C e. Ring /\ Q e. Ring ) /\ ( T e. ( C GrpHom Q ) /\ T e. ( ( mulGrp ` C ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` Q ) ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 10, 18, 21 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T e. ( C RingHom Q ) ) |
